description: D-Switch topology with up to 5 hosts and 1 downstream ports with x16 links. The BAR2 size of all host ports is 256MB. In a D-Switch topology, all hosts are directly connected to the switch without an NTB host adapter. Host ports 1-4 is associated with downsteam ports 21-24.
name: D-Switch 5 hosts x16, 256MB BAR. 1 downstream port
